participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and observant, with a great sense of humor.
participant_1.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. i am now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park.

participant_2.personality: Easy-going and friendly, with a great appreciation for family.
participant_2.background: i have three children. i'm a plumber. my wife and kids are the best. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.
